Sound Familiar?

You're Not Alone in This Struggle

Every day, you tell yourself tomorrow will be different. But depression, addiction, or the weight of past trauma keeps pulling you back. It doesn't have to be this way.

Feeling Stuck

You've tried therapy, maybe tried medications before, but nothing seems to work long-term. The cycle continues.

Medications Not Working

Side effects, wrong dosages, or treatments that helped at first but stopped. You deserve a provider who listens and adjusts.

Overwhelmed by Life

Stress piling up, responsibilities mounting, and you're running on empty. The weight feels heavier every day.

Battling Addiction

Caught in patterns you can't break. Shame, secrecy, and the fear that it's too late. It's not too late.

What if you had a provider who truly understood?

Someone who has walked the path of recovery themselves. Who knows that healing isn't linear, and that finding the right treatment takes patience, expertise, and genuine care.

The Revival Approach

Personalized Care That
Meets You Where You Are

At Revival Recovery Services, we don't believe in one-size-fits-all treatment. We take the time to understand your unique story, your challenges, and your goals—then create a personalized treatment plan that actually works for your life.

Evidence-Based Medication Management

Careful evaluation and adjustment of psychiatric medications, with ongoing monitoring for optimal results.

Medication-Assisted Treatment (MAT)

Suboxone and other FDA-approved treatments for addiction, combined with recovery support.

Flexible Appointments

Telehealth or in-person visits to fit your schedule. Same-week availability when you need it most.

Why Revival Recovery

A Provider Who Truly Understands

Conor Westerman brings more than clinical expertise—he brings lived experience, deep empathy, and a genuine commitment to your recovery.

Conor Westerman

PMHNP-BC

Arizona License #227933

13+ Years in Personal Recovery

Conor doesn't just understand addiction from textbooks—he's lived it and overcome it. This personal journey gives him unique insight into what truly helps people heal and stay well.

Decade of Mental Health Experience

Over 10 years working in mental health settings, including extensive experience at The Meadows Behavioral Healthcare—one of the nation's most respected treatment centers.

Board-Certified Expertise

PMHNP-BC certified with specialized training in trauma-informed care, evidence-based practices, and the latest psychiatric treatments including medication-assisted therapy.

Whole-Person Approach

True healing addresses mind, body, and spirit. Conor's approach combines clinical excellence with genuine compassion, meeting you where you are on your journey.

Learn More About Conor

Our Services

Comprehensive Care for Your Mental Health

From medication management to addiction recovery, we offer the specialized psychiatric services you need to rebuild your life.

Psychiatric Medication Management

Comprehensive evaluation and ongoing management of psychiatric medications. We carefully adjust dosages and treatments to optimize your mental health outcomes.

  • Initial psychiatric evaluation
  • Medication optimization
  • Side effect management
  • Regular follow-up care

Medication-Assisted Treatment (MAT)

FDA-approved treatments like Suboxone combined with supportive care for addiction recovery. Break free from the cycle with proven medical support.

  • Suboxone treatment
  • Individualized treatment plans
  • Relapse prevention
  • Recovery coaching integration

Recovery Coaching

Ongoing support and guidance from someone who has walked the path of recovery. Build skills, accountability, and a sustainable foundation for lasting wellness.

  • Personal recovery guidance
  • Skill building
  • Accountability support
  • Long-term wellness planning

Telehealth Services

Convenient, secure video appointments from anywhere in Arizona. Get the care you need without the commute—same quality, maximum flexibility.

  • HIPAA-compliant video visits
  • Prescription management
  • Flexible scheduling
  • Arizona-wide availability

Insurance & Payment

We Accept Most Major Insurance Plans

We believe cost shouldn't be a barrier to getting the care you need. We work with most major insurance providers and offer transparent self-pay options.

Don't see your insurance? Contact us—we may still be able to help through out-of-network benefits or sliding scale options.
